text: Vspomni (o prorok!), kogda My tebe skazali: "Tvoy Gospod' ob"yemlet vsekh lyudey Svoim vedeniyem. Oni vse nakhodyatsya v Yego vlasti. Pereday im Nashe Pisaniye i ne boysya nikogo. Allakh zashchishchayet tebya ot nikh. Poistine, to chudesnoye videniye, kotoroye yavilos' tebe v tvoyom nochnom puteshestvii, - eto lish' ispytaniye na veru dlya lyudey, v rezul'tate kotorogo uverovavshiye budut yeshcho bol'she verit', a nevernyye budut yeshcho bol'she zabluzhdat'sya v neverii. To derevo, proklyatoye v Korane, - derevo "zakkum", kotoroye rastot v adu, yavlyayetsya tol'ko ispytaniyem lyudey na veru. Oni skazali: "Ogon' szhigayet derev'ya. Kak zhe mozhet on ikh vyrashchivat'? " My ikh ustrashayem etim. No eto uvelichivayet v nikh velikuyu nepokornost', i oni perekhodyat ustanovlennyye predely
